item.title: Yandex Cloud
item.description: Yandex Cloud # Resource Structure in Yandex Cloud # As a rule: 1 cloud == 1 company 1 catalog == 1 project Resource Manager is responsible for organising resources in a structure and assigning permissions. There are 2 types of roles: primitive predefined roles: global roles through all the services viewer editor admin service roles: granular roles per each single service fygbyvghcgh Roles are inherited: editor on a Cloud can manage resources in any catalog of the Cloud editor on a Catalog can manage only the resources withing that Catalog Users # There are 3 types of users:
